tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE biometric_data (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  session_id INT,
  heart_rate INT,
  body_temperature DECIMAL(4,2),
  session_duration INTERVAL
);

CREATE TABLE therapy_sessions (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  session_start TIMESTAMP,
  session_end TIMESTAMP,
  therapist_name VARCHAR(50),
  therapist_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE therapy_sessions (
  session_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id VARCHAR(255),
  therapist_id VARCHAR(255),
  session_date DATE,
  session_duration INTERVAL
);

CREATE TABLE therapy_exercises (
  exercise_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  session_id INT,
  exercise_name VARCHAR(255),
  reps_completed INT,
  weight_used INT,
  duration TIME
);

CREATE TABLE patient_biometric_data (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  heart_rate INT,
  blood_pressure VARCHAR,
  temperature FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE physical_therapy_sessions (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  therapist_id INT,
  session_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE exercises (
  exercise_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  exercise_name VARCHAR,
  difficulty_level VARCHAR,
  duration_minutes INT
)

CREATE TABLE exercise_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  session_id INT,
  exercise_id INT,
  completion_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE patient_information (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  height FLOAT,
  weight FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE therapy_sessions (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  therapist_id INT,
  session_date TIMESTAMP,
  session_duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE exercises (
  exercise_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  exercise_name VARCHAR(50),
  difficulty_level INT,
  recommended_repetitions INT
)

CREATE TABLE biometric_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  session_id INT,
  heart_rate INT,
  blood_pressure VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE therapist_information (
  therapist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_name VARCHAR(50),
  specialization VARCHAR(50)
)
